name: Slasher (mog13)
description:
Slasher is a 2D top down stealth/horror game.

you need to dispatch of the victims before they depart at sun up. Will you embody a knife wielding maniac and run the risk of the heroes spotting a grizzly scene? or calmly take them down, one by one, stashing the bodies as you go. 

This was made in 48 hours as a self imposed game jam by Matt Thomas and Morgan Owen. We'd love to know what you think!
